name: Marionette Eden Breakers
description:
Defeat monsters approaching the heriones!
「Marionette Eden Breakers」 features cute heroines in a Hack-and-Slash action game.
Defeat lots of monsters and have some lewd "communications" with the heroines...

The more you fight, the more powerful you become!
Defeat monsters using a variety of weapons.
The more monsters you defeat, the more powerful your weapons become.
Beat monsters with your overwhelming attacks.

H-animations!
Enjoy H animations with every heroines.
